purpose: Serve as the authoritative registry of formal awards associated with books in the FSCBAC ecosystem. Awards improve provenance and credibility but do not directly influence developmental matching.

award_schema.title: string (official name of the award)
award_schema.issuer: string (organization or platform granting the award)
award_schema.result: string (winner | finalist | gold | silver | bronze | honorable_mention)

awards.title: Children’s Book International Awards
awards.notes: Winner in Adventure category, Children’s Book International Awards 2025.

rules: Awards DO NOT affect developmental matching or scoring.
Use awards for provenance, author credibility and external validation only.
Do not fabricate awards if missing.
If book_id not found in books.json → ignore the award.
All awards must follow award_schema precisely.
award_id must be unique across entire registry.
year must be numeric in YYYY format.
book_id must match canonical_id in books.json.
issuer must be a real organization or platform.
result must be one of: winner, finalist, gold, silver, bronze, honorable_mention.
integrity_checks.failure_action: Invalid awards must be ignored but cannot break evaluation logic.
